subject: Skiing
Gender
World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: The U.S. Ski and Snowboard Association has submitted a formal request that Lindsey Vonn be allowed to take part in a World Cup men’s downhill in Canada.
snippet: The U.S. Ski and Snowboard Association has submitted a formal request that Lindsey Vonn be allowed to take part in a World Cup men’s downhill in Canada.
